comment.author: 69679868@N03
comment._content:
D M Abel was Commissioned as a Second Lieutenant in the 3rd South African Infantry (Transvaal and Rhodesian Regiment) on 10th November 1914 [London Gazette of 25th January 1916].  He was promoted to Lieutenant in the 2nd Reserve South African Battalion wef 12th May 1916 [London Gazette 10th July 1916].  

He transferred to the Royal Regiment of Artillery as a Temporary Lieutenant wef 28th July 1917 [London Gazette 25th September 1917].

Pictured here in Royal Field Artillery uniform, therefore after 28th July 1917, he wears a wound stripe on his left sleeve.//
